1398600.name: Fill and Cross World Contest
1398600.description:
Guess all the pictures and win the world contest!

Solve in 6 elegant locations in the most prestigious casino.

More than 4 hours of gameplay, excellent music, magnificent trophies and full immersion in a truly world contest's atmosphere!

- The game in the genre of nonograms
- 120 unique levels
- More than 4 hours of gameplay
- Spectacular trophies
- Magnificent casino halls
1398600.supported_languages: 英语, 德语, 俄语
